data.title: Great hangout spot!
data.text: This is not a restaurant... It IS an excellent place to drink beer, hang with friends, and lounge around. They offer homemade brews, kombucha, and a limited menu of appetizers and snacks. A nice quiet environment, you can come in to study or play board games even. I will definitely be a return customer.

data.title: Just OK
data.text:
We went here to try some beer and Kombucha as it looked like a fun place.  The atmosphere was nice, fun decor with games out to keep you occupied.  

The beer was ok, not a huge selection of their own brews which is what we went there for.  We are new to Kombucha, and were disappointed at their selection, the ones we tried were ok, but not something we would go back for.
